text: Waheeda Rehman (born 14 May 1936) is an Indian movie and stage actress. She mostly appeared in Hindi movies. She was known for her roles in Reshma Aur Shera, Guide, Neel Kamal, and in Khamoshi. Rehman was born in Chengalpattu, Tamil Nadu, British India. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:People of British India
title: Waheeda Rehman
